column4: is it possible to run a 64bit virtual OS on a 32 bit installed OS?
there may be a paravirtualization solution out there which is capable of doing that, perhaps qemu, that is one of the most flexible VMs... but I can't speak for vmware or virtualbox
alright, thanks. I've got qemu on here, but I can't get it to run, which is why I was asking in regards to vbox
